title: S13 Ep46: Between Love and Hate: The Devil is Real
itunes:title: Between Love and Hate: The Devil is Real
description:
It's Frightening Friday on BEYOND the DARKNESS & we find ourselves Between Love and Hate: The Devil is Real with guest John Eagan.

A god fearing man, artist, musician is confronted with the supernatural - something that eventually exposes itself as Demonic. A man and his family suddenly find their beliefs tested and with terrifying confrontations.

AND A NEW THEATER OF THE MIND!

Get his book here: www.John-Eagan.com

Start a 30-day trial of Audible and your first audiobook is free. Go to audible.com/btd or text btd to 500-500
